Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Keek
Reviews.Content: I was initially hesitant to purchase this camera with all the negative feedback earlier models had received, but I'm *so* glad I did! It's compact and aesthetically pleasing, and ridiculously easy to use. I brought it to a Water Park the first day I had it and it endured submersion after submersion- it even went down a few slides with us too! It's durable (I admit I dropped it already) and the batteries lasted the whole day of picture taking/reviewing without needing to be changed! The pictures come out clear with and without the flash outside, and the clarity of the indoor pictures (with flash) are great! I take a lot of arm's length shots of my family and self and *those* pictures come out perfect outside with no flash, but really washed out if you use the flash indoors (and too dark without it), so that is my only gripe- which isn't that  much of one, seeing as how I have a tripod for use in that circumstance, that I was just too lazy to use that day. I would recommend this camera again and again!

Reviews.Title: Not a bad little camera
Reviews.Author: lenahicks
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use at the beach, and it was well worth the money.  Most of the time my 7-year-old nephew had the camera.  We all got some wonderful shots in and out of water.  I didn't give it a 5 star rating because we went through about 8 sets of batteries in a week.  Part of that may be due to the number of photos my nephew took.

Reviews.Title: water life
Reviews.Author: Turtle Girl
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great underwater pictures. The pictures come out nice. The problem with the camera is the reflection of the preview screen. Underwater and in the sun the pictures can not be seen on the screen. Therefor, it is hard to see if a good picture was taken or not until after you not in the water or not in the sun. The camera also is slow to take one picture to the next. So you have to be as fast a the fastest fish to get the picture. After I previewed the pictures I took at the reef most of them were very nice. I would recommend it for the price and convenience.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Nicole K. Schellpeper
Reviews.Content: Used this camera on a snorkeling trip and it worked well.  I would suggest buying extended life batteries, because it did drain quickly.

Reviews.Title: Big Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Gloria Maynard
Reviews.Content: My 15 year old wanted this to take pictures at the pool and the beach.  It was a total disappointment.  Even with brand new fresh batteries, the camera would only take 4-5 pictures before dying.  Sending back right away!

Reviews.Title: works great for just a fun little camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Cummings "Mary Cummings"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so my grandchildren could use it at the lake while out boating and tubing.  In my opinion it is a great little camera. The water pictures turned out clear and the ones taken in the car were really good too.  For the price it more than fills the bill. We actually were going to get a different waterproof camera but it was out of stock which I kinda think worked in our favor as I kept searching and found this bell and howell . I would tell anyone looking for a good waterproof camera that is mostly to be used by teenagers invest in this one.

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: tigger2o
Reviews.Content: When I got this product I was excited. I thought it would be great to take on vacation, but when I tried to test is out it would keep on saying that my card was full.  I followed all of the instructions and formatted my 16GB Micro SD, but it still does not work. I am disappointed and wish that I never wasted the money.

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera!
Reviews.Author: Jamie M Rich
Reviews.Content: First of all, the photos are very bad! You definitely get what you pay for with this camera! It is very slow and hard to get a good shot! The batteries wore out SOOOO fast and it turns off in the middle of use!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Irish Rain
Reviews.Content: This camera is a total waste of money and time.  The camera I got does not read memory cards. It always says that the card is full.  I would suggest that you spend more money and get a name brand camera that will work the first time.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Batteries last well, pictures look great and it's waterproof.  Very easy for anyone to pickup and use.  What more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Underwater camera not good for underwater
Reviews.Author: Pixie
Reviews.Content: Batteries required are AAA and die after an hour or so of snorkeling.  The camera turns off way too quickly from inactivity.  I couldn't see the screen underwater to focus, zoom or even know what I was shooting pictures of.  Waste of money, and I was in Hawaii with clear water!!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: mrdude
Reviews.Content: I don't know what the other people giving this camera bad reviews were talking about or if they are the type who only buy expensive $200 cameras but this worked great on a recent trip going snorkeling and the best part was that it was only 50 bucks! Instead of taking a few rolls of film for a disposable camera, I wanted to get a digital camera that I didn't have to worry about changing film or running out while I was in the water.Battery life - I took about 100 pictures in the water in the span of a few hours and the battery only changed from a full 3 bars to 2/3 bars so the poor battery life suggested by the other reviewers was a non issue for me.Picture quality - The picture quality underwater was awesome and you could see all the fish with really great detail. I only had a couple bad pictures when I took the picture right after turning it on without letting the camera adjust to the brightness of the sun, otherwise everything was great during the day underwater without using any flash. Above water, the pictures turned out pretty good, but not nearly as good as underwater - I usually just use my iphone anyways for pictures so if you complain about this taking bad pictures everywhere else, who cares just use your phone's camera since you'll probably have it on you anyways.Videos - I took a video underwater and it was pretty good quality and also had sound with it tooOverall, definitely worth the $50 since I don't have to develop multiple rolls of film now and can just copy from the microSD card to my computer, plus whenever I want to take underwater pictures I now have a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Bell+Howell Spash camera
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Bell & Howell camera for my 4 year old grandson. It was physically smaller than I anticipated but works well for him. Once I showed him the on/off button and shutter button he was able to take it from there and figured out on his own how to view pictures. He was even able to take pictures of himself by the end of the day. Worth the money for a first camera, quality would be somewhat inferior to an experienced photographer.

Reviews.Title: Picture zoom quality poor
Reviews.Author: charlie
Reviews.Content: Zoom pictures are always blurry.  Others are fine, is completely water proof.  Just wish better quality pics.  Too late to return otherwise I would.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Aryn Wilson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to take on a white water rafting trip.  It didn't arrive in time for the trip but I figured I'd be able to use it again and brought it with me on a camping trip to the beach a few weeks later.  While it does fine taking pictures of things at a distance (ie landscapes), any picutre that you take that's any closer come out blurred.  All of the pictures that I took of my family didn't come out at all.  The camera just couldn't seem to focus on anything closer than fifty feet away.  This camera is worthless and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price and purpose.
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: I am happy with this camera, it does what I needed it to do quite well, even though it took no pictures at all without the memory card.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this before our cruise because I wanted a camera to take to the pool, the beach and on a kayak. The camera takes decent pictures outside in bright sunlight (something any basic camera should do well), it does not take even adequate pictures inside with a flash. I returned it, however, because it would only read the memory card less than half the time - so I'd miss picture opportunities because I would have to turn the camera off and on a few times until it read the card.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Margaret Knorr
Reviews.Content: got this camera for my son for Christmas to use in their trapping endeavors.  his father likes them to document their trap layouts and the terrain, as well as take pictures of any animal tracks or interesting things they see along the trapline.  due to walking through creeks and snowshowers, a waterproof camera is essential and this did a great job.

Reviews.Title: Higher than expected quality, definitely waterproof
Reviews.Author: Andy G
Reviews.Content: I took this camera with me while snorkeling for several days. It was underwater for 1-2 hours at a time, taking many pictures. While I don't have specifics, I'd say that the quality was generally good for a camera of this kind both in and out of the water, it took many pictures on a single set of AAA batteries, and a 2GB card was plenty for me. I'd recommend this if you don't want to deal with higher end cameras in potentially-leaking bags. With this camera, I could swim around and enjoy swimming rather than worry about my camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: slippery nickel
Reviews.Content: Loved it but lost it or some one took it, bet my old man found it lol, works great under water and it fogs up fast so be aware when combing to snap a pic above water level after the cam was under water.

Reviews.Title: Good camera with short battery life
Reviews.Author: glowlite 88
Reviews.Content: The camera works as advertised underwater but apparently the screen is too much for the batteries. We have rechargeables- take plenty of spares.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: L
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera. All of the photos came out very well once imported to the computer. Better than expected.

Reviews.Title: compact camera
Reviews.Author: dlwmoore
Reviews.Content: This is a great compact waterproof camera. It is small enough to fit in your pocket yet has the features of a big camera.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good camera
Reviews.Author: Jlp
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised with this camera. I had a different brand before that took pretty bad pictures and this camera was much better. The flash helped take pictures underwater in the ocean.  I took most of the pictures during the day on the beach or in the pool and they came out better than I expected.This camera does not float so I would recommend a floating wrist strap if you are using it outside of a pool. For the price, I was happy with the results.

Reviews.Title: great quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Ellen Young
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures.  Gave it some Lithium batteries and it lasted all day....... is still going..... It remained waterproof even when dipped into cleaning agents. Could not ask for more especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work as I exptected it to...
Reviews.Author: Joe M.
Reviews.Content: The only real good thing I can point out is that it's definitely waterproof. I took this on a canoeing trip in September 2013 and it was in the water for the majority of a day without any trouble. But the way the camera took pictures left me very disappointed after many of them were far too overexposed, and the contrast and brightness settings were too emphasized. If you're looking for a good all-weather camera, go with a more reputable brand.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera.
Reviews.Author: amer islamovic
Reviews.Content: The camera worked fine for my wife and I.The underwater pictures are actually pretty good for such a cheap camera.If you can bring another camera for taking pictures on land, I'd suggest you do so.We ended up using my phone while walking around Nassau, because out of water the camera is quite terrible.Nonetheless it was worth buying this little thing, as we got some great pictures with dolphins, and us swimming in the ocean.

Reviews.Title: This is not a Bad Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Carter "Grimreaper"
Reviews.Content: for a 12 pixel cam it takes bad photos inside with false light outside it takes great photos as long as you don't have to much sun ot it will show a Purple streak through your photos it has a Mod for Video  but slow on focus.  Waterproof cam it is great on floats down the river playing in the snow. and anything to do with wet areas. LIKE I said It is Great for use OUTSIDE

Reviews.Title: dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: joanna lopez
Reviews.Content: picture were too blurry to appreciate even when not under water.  underwater pictures were too dark to even make out what images are.

Reviews.Title: Cute, compact, versatile camera
Reviews.Author: D. Scheeler "Proud American"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item as a gift for my daughter's birthday. We will use it on a snorkeling cruise vacation in the Caribbean in June. So far the pix we took in the house came out great (video as well) so we anticipate amazing underwater shots on vacation. The price is right, free shipping from the vendor on Amazon's site and it's a Bell & Howell product; they've been producing cameras forever so you can't go wrong with a trusted name. We purchased a 16 GB micro SD card & adapter from Amazon - this card can hold thousands of pix so we can wait to download our shots until we get home. I also recommend using rechargeable AAA batteries (Duracell's are best) with the camera instead of buying tons of batteries to travel with. We already have a battery charger that takes AA and AAA batteries - we can re-charge each night after shooting pix. I would recommend this compact handy camera!

Reviews.Title: great camera took great pics underwater
Reviews.Author: Donald Martin
Reviews.Content: We went on a snorkeling trip and wanted an underwater camara.  We bought this one because of the price.  And if any friends or family need it they can use it.  the reason we chose this one over a couple disposable ones is because to develop two disposable cameras and get them on a cd was about the same price as this camera that takes better pictures and we'll have it forever.  Not a fancy camera but takes good still.  Definatly recommend it over the disposable ones.

Reviews.Title: Eats batteries
Reviews.Author: Jaime Conatser "Jaimelynn"
Reviews.Content: The camera is great and takes great pictures but it eats batteries like crazy. I can take two pictures and need more batteries. I got rechargeables, but they need recharged after a few pics. So if you wanted to take a lot of pics, you better bring extra rechargeables with you.

Reviews.Title: Preview screen
Reviews.Author: Darryl Roach "DR"
Reviews.Content: Hi, Is there a way to fix the resolution on the preview screen. Its very dark sometimes,,and hard to see...good camera though, Is it shock proof though.Seems to be a nice camera, I just tested it out so far, have not used it yet..Check us out herewebsite. partyhousesuppliesfacebook. party house suppliesgmail.  trinipartyhouse at gmail

Reviews.Title: Good camera, ok pictures
Reviews.Author: Laoblue
Reviews.Content: A very similar camera (but only 8 MP) is the VistaQuest VQ-8920 (at Walmart.com) - 20 dollars cheaper!  Can't really say much about this camera but it is just a very, very basic camera at a low price.  So, keep expectations relative.  A more expensive model of a waterproof digital point and shoot is the Vivitar T026.

Reviews.Title: Hmm
Reviews.Author: felicia
Reviews.Content: I give this camera 3 stars because I am very particular about pictures and the clarity. I did return this camera because I was not satisfied with the pictures. It is more for children or teenagers to take in a pool for fun under water. It's small, comes with a case and batteries. You do needs micro sd card. I had one so it worked fine for me. The camera is kinda tricky with settings only a few buttons to navigate through the camera to get what you want. Cute but not for me..

Reviews.Title: buyer beware
Reviews.Author: John J. Tosch
Reviews.Content: bought this for my daughter for wedding and to take on her honeymoon.  She took great pictures and when she went to down load them they were gone.  She is devasated! We should sue Bell+Howell

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: kelly martin
Reviews.Content: The pictures only come out half the time, its hard to interface and not worth wasting the time to get it shipped much less trying to find a use for it.  Better off buying a one time use camera.

Reviews.Title: ha.
Reviews.Author: Hannah Huston
Reviews.Content: Didn't even receive it, I did however get my refund. That's a plus.... Wish I could of got it, was looking forward to an underwater camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof up to 10 feet
12 Mega Pixel Maximum Resolution
5 Mega Pixel CMOS Sensor; 8x Digital Zoom
Uses MicroSD Memory Cards up to 16GB (not included)
Uses 2 AAA Batteries (Included)
ProductInfo.Name: Bell+Howell Splash WP7 12 MP Waterproof Digital Camera Blue
